alert.note: Alert for Cody Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 04 at 2:06AM MDT until November 05 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 6 PM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. Isolated gusts to 80 mph are possible near Clark. * WHERE...Cody Foothills especially just south of Cody to the Wyoming...Montana border. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 6 PM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Elevated to extreme blowover risk for lightweight and high-profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...In a parking lot, park into the wind to minimize the possibility of your car door hitting another parked vehicle.
info.instruction: Use caution if you drive, and keep both hands on the steering wheel in case of a sudden strong wind gust.
